plot: José is a young journalist who gets fired over refusing to write an article about an American film crew, overdramatizing the situation in Argentina. When he goes looking for his old girlfriend, he runs into the crew again.
title: El amor es una mujer gorda
plot_es: José is a young journalist who gets fired over refusing to write an article about an American film crew, overdramatizing the situation in Argentina. When he goes looking for his old girlfriend, he runs into the crew again.
original_name: El amor es una mujer gorda

produce.name: Instituto Nacional de Cine y Artes Audiovisuales (INCAA)
